snippet: The fighting has intensified as the Ukrainian and Russian leaders prepare for a meeting in Minsk, Belarus, on Tuesday to explore a diplomatic solution to the conflict.
abstract: Ukrainian military presses its advance on Donetsk and Luhansk, two eastern provincial capitals held by pro-Russian separatists, in a day of violence that kills 52 civilians and Ukrainian soldiers and an unknown number of rebels.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth contributed reporting in Donetsk, Russia.

lead_paragraph: The fighting has intensified as the Ukrainian and Russian leaders prepare for a meeting in Minsk, Belarus, on Tuesday to explore a diplomatic solution to the conflict.

headline.main: Ukrainian Troops Press Rebels in Their Eastern Strongholds
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Troops Press Rebels in Their Eastern Strongholds

keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
